sentence.idiomatic: We have decided to select some outstanding management talent from within the company.
After going through a long selection process, she at last became the female lead for this movie.
They are in the process of selecting the athletes that will participate in the competition.
Chinese kung fu is marvelous.
I've encountered something amazing.
He has lots of amazing stories.
He went to attend a martial arts competition.
He wants to go to Shaolin Temple to study martial arts.
Chinese martial arts are famous.
This is the source of this river.
Do you know where is soccer originated from?
Athens is the birthplace of ancient European civilization.
He likes to go exploring in the jungle.
There are lots of jungles in Africa.
The untamed jungle is full of danger.
In recent years many houses have been built here.
This ancient architecture was built in the Ming Dynasty.
They plan to build a high-tech building here.
His tale is still being spread amongst the people today.
The goal of holding this activity is to spread Chinese culture.
Everyone is spreading word of their achievements.
Shaolin Kung Fu has 18 schools.
They are of different schools.
They are of different schools, but they have a good relationship.
Ensuring that children have good condition of body and mind is very important.
Skiing is a kind of exercise that benefits one's body and mind.
Facing so much pressure, he feels exhausted in body and mind.
Those elegant movements of hers left a deep impression on everyone.
His movements are extremely natural.
Only she is able to produce such elegant dance moves.
She is good at English. Ask her to help you to translate.
Everyone has something they are good at doing.
I am not good at dancing, you'd better ask someone else.
We should incorporate real-life situations into our work.
This song combines the characteristics of classical music with rock music.
In our studies, we need to combine theory and application.

Everyone look, in front of us is the Songshan Shaolin Temple. It is the birthplace of Shaolin Martial Arts. Because of it's position in the middle of the forest, it was given the name “Shaolin Temple.”
So, how old is it?
Shaolin Temple was built in 495 C.E. Afterwards, Dharma came here to spread the Chan sect. So, Shaolin Temple has also been called the birthplace of Chinese Chan Buddhism.
Oh, I didn’t know that. When people talk about Shaolin Temple, the first thing you think of is definitely kung fu.

word.literal: and to this must be added

sentence.idiomatic: Actually, Shaolin Kung Fu still has a strong link to Chan sect. Because the practice of Chan places importance on cultivation of the body, and such a large temple also needed protection, Chan and martial arts gradually merged into Shaolin Kung Fu. It lays equal stress on body and mind, and is the epitome of Chinese culture.
So that’s where the saying, “all the world’s kung fu stems from Shaolin” originally comes from. I’ve also heard the expression “Shaolin’s eighteen styles.” What is that?

That is saying that Shaolin Kung Fu has eighteen principal schools, all with their own characteristics. For example, some excel at the art of boxing, others are better at footwork. Still, their common ground is that movements are unrestrained and elegant, and perfectly unite Chan Buddhism with kung fu.
No wonder so many Chinese people and foreigners like to come here to study martial arts. Do you know how many monks there are now at Shaolin Temple?

word.literal: versed in both military and civilian affairs

sentence.idiomatic: This is difficult to calculate, because Shaolin Temple has many subordinate and branch organizations. However, Shaolin Temple always has a group of martial artist monks, gathered from amongst the best Buddhist monks. At the moment, there are 120 monks in the group. They go through a strict selection process, and every one is well-versed in both military and literary matters.
This all is really amazing. What are we all still standing here for? Quick, let’s go in!

word.literal: well-versed in both military and literary matters
